name: Face Of A Die
description:
Roll your dice around to fill all the holes in the ground.

Attempt to fill everything, and get the highest total score.

Some stages might be difficult to fill, some might be about aiming for the highest score.

Compete against others by sharing your seed and board size.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Move using WASD or arrow keys

Each time you roll the value of the dice increases by one. Move the dice into a hole to cover it. Moving over a dice in the ground decreases its value by one.  The score is the sum of all the dice in the ground.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made to feel like a board game

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game has a couple of issues due to the time limitation.

Known issues:
  • There is no coded in end condition, so consider the game done when you have filled all the holes or cannot move the dice the remaining holes.
  • I did not add a button to return to the setup page, so just reload the page.
  • The dice may spawn outside the playfield in certain seeds, this does harm the experience so please reload the game if you don't want to play like that.
